entry.title: neuherbs Daily Probiotics with Prebiotic Capsules (20 Billion CFU ) for Men & women with added Vitamin C, E & Selenium For Immunity & Digestion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Vitamins & Minerals
Price: 689.00 - 1299.00 (2 variants)

neuherbs Daily probiotics Supplement is a combination of Probiotics (6 strains) and Prebiotics (to feed probiotics). This Daily Probiotic supplement benefits you by improving digestion and immunity.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Probiotics For Digestion

    Probiotics are live healthy bacteria that help eliminate bad bacteria in the gut & restore the healthy gut microbiome which helps fight common digestion issues like bloating, indigestion, frequent diarrhea.

  • Probiotics For Boosting Immunity

    These Probiotics fight off bad bacteria, inflammation from the body, which makes you sick. It also helps strengthen the body's natural immune response.

  • Probiotics For Balancing Mood

    These Probiotics benefit you by improving nutrient absorption & help produce other nutrients that enhance your emotions, and you feel better.

— Key Ingredients —

  • 6 Strains of Probiotics

    To provide an essential variety of good gut bacteria.

  • Added Prebiotic

    To feed good gut bacteria for better functioning

  • Vitamin E, C, Selenium

    To deliver additional antioxidants support.

— How To Use —

  • Take one capsule

  • With 1 glass of water

  • Twice a day 30 minutes after meal

  • Is this vegan?

    neuherbs Daily Probiotic is a vegetarian product with 6 different strains of probiotics, but it has lactose as a key ingredient due to which it might not be suitable for vegans.

  • Does this need to be refrigerated?

    Yes, it requires refrigeration after opening. Storing probiotics in the refrigerator (not in the freezer) is recommended to maintain a probiotic’s viability. Many Probiotics are naturally sensitive to heat and moisture. Heat and moisture can reduce the viability of Probiotics. Hence, refrigeration is essential for the goodness of Probiotics so that their viability is maintained till their shelf life.

  • Is it preservative-free?

    Yes, neuherbs Daily Probiotic is preservative free.

  • What is the shelf-life?

    neuherbs Daily Probiotic is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Can I use the Daily Probiotics capsule powder by pouring in milk?

    Yes, you can use the Probiotics Capsule powder by pouring in milk.

  • Does these capsule contains live bacteria?

    Yes, Probiotics are the live bacteria which fights off bad bacteria in our intestine.

  • Is the capsule shell veg or non-veg?

    neuherbs Probiotics is made up of veg capsule shell
